ComicInfo.Summary:
The Edge of Madness: Debbie is asked to babysit for the new family in town.
The Diary of a Dead Man!: Barney Roberts tries to solve the death of Mr. Crawford.
Experiment 1000: An experimental gorilla learns to talk.
The Sorcerer's Handcuffs: A set of magical handcuffs binds any two people together until good triumphs over evil.
Death Watch!: A man steals a watch that makes him younger.
A Will to Kill!: Uncle Jacob tells his three evil nephews that his entire fortune will go to the last one of them alive, so they plot to kill each other.
ComicInfo.Writer: Carl Wessler,George Kashdan,Murray Boltinoff,Bill Dennehy,Bill Dennehy,Carl Wessler,Murray Boltinoff,George Kashdan
